page.title: 16Youth Club
page.content: I attend Youth Club at Caldicot Leisure Centre. It is held in the youth room and costs Â£1.00 to join. You can play Table Tennis, Darts and Pool. There are also computer games. On Monday and Tuesday we go swimming and on Thursday we play Badminton. There are eight instructors and about seventy children whose ages range from seven to seventeen. The seniors are not allowed to go on Tuesdays because the games are only suitable for juniors. Sometimes we are taken to Bristol Ice Rink or to Wentwood Reservoir picnic area in the mini-bus. We all enjoy Youth Club and the instructors work very hard to teach us new skills.
